彍字的基本解释

彍
guō
拉满（弓弩）：“十贼彍弩，百吏不敢前。”
扩大：“彍又滂仁，耿照充天。”
快捷：“驾尘彍风，与电争光。”。

彍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guō］
［《廣韻》古博切，入鐸，見。］
［《廣韻》虚郭切，入鐸，曉。］
亦作“彉1”。
(1)张满弩弓。
(2)引申为射。
(3)犹光大。
(4)乘；驾驭。

彍字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【弓字部】　彍； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页361第15
【玉篇】同彉。　又彍騎，唐宿衞兵也。【唐書·兵志】開元十一年，取京兆蒲同岐華府兵及白丁，而益以潞州長從兵，共十二萬，號曰長從宿衞。明年，更號曰彍騎。　又凡迅捷者曰彍。【韓愈·送窮文】駕塵彍風，與電爭光。

彍字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
彍字的起名意思

暂无。

彍
Basic explanation of words
彍
guō
Pullman (bow and crossbow): "Ten thieves smash the crossbow, and a hundred officials dare not move forward."
Expansion: "You and Pengren, Geng Zhao is full of heaven."
Quick: "Drive dust and wind, win glory with electricity.".
彍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guō］
["Guangyun" Gu Boqie, enter the priest, see you. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Guoqi, enter the duo, Xiao. ]
Also known as "彉1".
(1) Full of crossbows.
(2) Extended to shooting.
(3) Juguangda.
(4) Ride; drive.
彍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Jixia] [Bow Character Department] 　彍; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 361 15
【Jade articles】Same as 彉.　Ride again, Tang Su guards too. [Tang Shu·Bingzhi] In the eleventh year of Kaiyuan, I took Jingzhaopu Tongqi Huafu soldiers and Baiding, and the governor Yiyilu joined the army with a total of 120,000. Next year, the number will be changed.　Everyone who is quick says 彍. [Han Yu·Send Qiongwen] Drive dust and wind, win glory with electricity.
彍
